description.summary: Interpreter of object-oriented scripting language Ruby
description.p: Ruby is the interpreted scripting language for quick and easy object-oriented programming. It has many features to process text files and to do system management tasks (as in perl). It is simple, straight-forward, and extensible.
In the name of this package, `2.4' indicates the Ruby library compatibility version. This package currently provides the `2.4.x' branch of Ruby.

maintainer-scripts.postinst:
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby2" ]; then ln -sf "ruby2.4" "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby2" fi
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby" ]; then ln -sf "ruby2.4" "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby" fi
maintainer-scripts.postrm:
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby2" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby2" fi
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ruby" fi
